channel.title: Films on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Films on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Peter Dinklage as The Toxic Avenger is finally coming to theaters
item.description: It’s not for the squeamish, but if a campy blood-splattered B-movie is your jam, the film opens Aug. 29.

item.title: They’re golden: Fictional band from K-Pop Demon Hunters tops the charts
item.description: Netflix film’s appeal fueled by killer K-pop soundtrack with one banger after another.

item.title: Karl Urban is a wise-cracking Johnny Cage in Mortal Kombat II
item.description: “I’m not some champion. I don’t have Transformer arms or shoot lightning bolts. I’m an actor.”
